original: split. - intros H. rewrite nat_meet_joins in H. induction n. -- intros i Hi. inversion Hi. -- intros i Hi. simpl in H. destruct (binary_le_joins_inv _ _ _ H) as [g [Hg Hgi]]. specialize (Hgi i Hi). rewrite Hg in H. rewrite nat_meet_joins in H. rewrite msum_ext with (f := g) in H; auto. destruct (nat_joins_binary_le_right (f i) n g) as [j [Hj Hgji]]. rewrite H. exists i. split; auto. split; auto. rewrite nat_meet_joins in H. apply Hgi. intros k Hk. apply Hgi. apply binary_le_joins_inv'; eauto. rewrite Hg in H. apply nat_joins_binary_le_left with (m := 0). ++ intro k. intro Hk. specialize (Hgi k Hk). rewrite Hgi in *. discriminate. ++ apply H. - intros H. rewrite nat_meet_joins. apply nat_joins_binary_le. intros i Hi. exists i. split; auto. apply H; auto.
